title: RP Sale
body:
I was wondering if there is any planned RP sales? I think I remember awhile back, probably a long time ago I just don't remember, Riot used to do them. Was wondering if there are any future plans for stuff like this?

Edit: It was extra RP with each purchase.

replies.body: It doesn't seem like they've got any plans so far for something like this, but be sure to check the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) just in case we get surprised!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=JWZREwwl,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-20T05:45:10.741+0000)
>
> It doesn't seem like they've got any plans so far for something like this, but be sure to check the [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news) just in case we get surprised!

Thanks for the reply :)

The last Bonus RP sale (Where the '+Bonus RP' amounts added onto the flat RP amounts through checkout were increased) I think was back in the Lunar Revel of 2016. I think once Riot added the lootbox system, they abolished the bonus RP events. I haven't heard of any sales like that in a while. I could imagine it's to keep people from holding back purchases for new content _exclusive to lootboxes _ in hopes that they'd save money down the line. Or in short, to keep the integrity of the lootbox system and its value. ----Just my personal conspiracy thoughts.
